page.title: 16The Ambulance Station.
page.content: We visited the Ambulance Station where Mr.Fraser showed us around. There are six front vehicles,one relief and one sitter bus.The front vehicles have blue lights on the top and a siren. They are used for emergencies.The sitter bus isn't used for emergencies but for transporting people to and from hospital. Before beginning their shift each crew member checks his or her own ambulance.Inside the ambulance is all the necessary equipment.The enterox gas is in a blue cylinder with a quarter white collar,this is for easing pain.The oxygen cylinder is black with a white collar.The suction pump is used to suck debris from the throat.The resusitator is the same as the oxygen bottle but is used to get a victim breathing again.The chair is used for people who are unable to walk
